profile.name: Adonai
profile.title: Software Developer/Engineer, Application/Web Developer
profile.description:
Result-driven software engineer and web developer with over 4+ years of experience and proficiency in designing and implementing user interfaces, coding, debugging, frontend, and backend technologies, as well as maximizing the profitability of businesses, websites, and mobile applications by achieving client and corporate objectives. Expertise in software development, programming languages, E-Commerce, SEO, and database management, as well as an in-depth knowledge of IT platforms. Proficient in analyzing complex situations, maintaining productive and cooperative relationships, and exercising sound judgment.
A vital team member who excels at conceiving effective strategies and tactics to improve the quality of the customer experience while delivering top-notch services.

challenges.description:
As a skilled leader, I expertly guided a team of 6 talented web developers to success. My responsibilities included conducting thorough keyword research, creating exceptional content, and optimizing clients' SEO to ensure maximum visibility and engagement. With my exceptional skills in client management and collaboration, I successfully arranged meetings with over 15 clients to gain insights into their unique needs and negotiate successful deals. Working alongside a team of 6 members, we developed tailored solutions that met the specific technical requirements of each client.

During my journey, I provided valuable expertise and support by generating and updating database queries, creating and reviewing reports to address any unforeseen challenges, and delivering precise progress reports to management. 
With a commitment to punctuality and a savvy utilization of all available resources, including remote access tools and software, I consistently demonstrated a reliable and trustworthy approach.As a skilled leader, I expertly guided a team of 6 talented web developers to success. Skills: Problem Solving · Adaptive Thinking · Negociación · CMS · WooCommerce · Wix · E-commerce · Marketing digital · Optimización para motores de búsqueda (SEO) · WordPress

My role involves devising effective strategies, providing guidance to clients, and developing customized plans to facilitate their rapid attainment of optimal positioning. Formulate effective tactics to enhance website traffic and improve search engine rankings. In addition, I conduct research to identify, expand, and optimize relevant keywords, and execute SEO recommendations to enhance website visibility and performance.

Also, I devise and execute a strategy for link-building, collaborate with editorial and marketing teams to enhance content and programming, and liaise with the development team to incorporate optimal SEO practices into new code. I recommend considering modifications to the website's framework, content, linking structure, and other pertinent elements.
I create websites utilizing WordPress and artificial intelligence.My role involves devising effective strategies, providing guidance to clients, and developing customized plans to facilitate their rapid attainment of optimal positioning. As the head of special projects at ETECSA, Cuba's sole telecommunications provider, I spearheaded the development of a highly effective web platform for clients utilizing the company's internet services. Additionally, I designed a web system to streamline fuel management and handling, resulting in a 90% satisfaction rate among department staff. 

My approach to client complaints was swift and effective, presenting solutions and alternatives in a timely manner and following up to ensure complete resolution. I remained at the forefront of emerging technologies, constantly seeking new ways to enhance the department's technological landscape. Above all, I prioritized client satisfaction and established lasting professional relationships through exceptional service and attention to detail.As the head of special projects at ETECSA, Cuba's sole telecommunications provider, I spearheaded the development of a highly effective web platform for clients utilizing the company's internet services. As a dynamic member of a skilled development team, I thrived in the fast-paced world of freelance work on Upwork. Over the course of an exciting 8-month journey, I dedicated myself to excellence as a backend developer for a renowned freelance agency.

During my time with the agency, I embraced the opportunity to take on diverse projects, ranging from small-scale web applications to complex systems. Leveraging my expertise in Laravel and PHP, I played an instrumental role in crafting innovative and efficient solutions.

My contributions included designing and implementing robust backend architectures, creating efficient database structures, and optimizing code performance for seamless user experiences. Collaborating closely with the team, I consistently delivered high-quality code on time, exceeding client expectations.

My work experience as a freelance backend developer has not only deepened my technical proficiency but also sharpened my communication and project management skills. It has shaped me into a versatile professional who excels in delivering top-notch results while adhering to project timelines and client objectives.

I am immensely proud of the accomplishments achieved during my time as part of the development team, and I am eager to bring my expertise and enthusiasm to new challenges. With my solid foundation in Laravel, PHP, and a passion for creating exceptional web solutions, I am confident in my ability to contribute to future projects and make a lasting impact.

Skills: Problem Solving · Firebase · GitHub · Vercel · Optimización para motores de búsqueda (SEO) · Tailwind CSS · TypeScript · Mongoose · Express.js · Vuejs · JavaScript · WordPress · MySQL · PHP · Laravel · Node.js

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: My ideal job is where I can interact with my work colleagues, constantly learn and set new goals by adding value to the company. But above all things that my salary allows me to live well.
